rev.desc.rev.desc: On the spread.level panel, modified the setting of $L.spread.stop to use "Y" or "N" instead of true or false.
Refactored code to match the code used in foreground (RAD=sla.outage.process).
Removed calls to apm.get.related.query and call.outage.dependency and refactored code to call single RAD app=sc.outage.process for spreading and outage dependency processing.
Removed calls to apm.get.related.query and call.outage.dependency and refactored code to call single RAD app=sc.outage.process for spreading and outage dependency processing.
Modified code to be consistent with outage spreading and outage dependency calls in RAD=sla.outage.process.

Made the processing for outage spreading consistent with that from RAD=sla.outage.process. Following panels were either created or modified: spread.level, decide.spread, pre.get.spread, start, call.spread, append.list, finish.spread, set.final.list, call.outageevent.process.
On panel get.control, changed the "No Record Found Exit" from "sla.outageevent.wrapper" to "exit.normal".
Added lioption check for "SLA" to the check.parms panel.

descript.descript: On the spread.level panel, modified the setting of $L.spread.stop to use "Y" or "N" instead of true or false.
Refactored code to match the code used in foreground (RAD=sla.outage.process).
Removed calls to apm.get.related.query and call.outage.dependency and refactored code to call single RAD app=sc.outage.process for spreading and outage dependency processing.
Removed calls to apm.get.related.query and call.outage.dependency and refactored code to call single RAD app=sc.outage.process for spreading and outage dependency processing.
Modified code to be consistent with outage spreading and outage dependency calls in RAD=sla.outage.process.

Made the processing for outage spreading consistent with that from RAD=sla.outage.process). Following panels were either created or modified: spread.level, decide.spread, pre.get.spread, start, call.spread, append.list, finish.spread, set.final.list, call.outageevent.process.
On panel get.control, changed the "No Record Found Exit" from "sla.outageevent.wrapper" to "exit.normal".
Added lioption check for "SLA" to the check.parms panel.
